entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
